search.query: | tstats `summariesonly` sum(Traffic.count) AS flows, values(Traffic.src_host) AS src_host, values(Traffic.dest_host) AS dest_host, values(Traffic.direction) AS direction, values(Traffic.transport) AS transport, values(Traffic.src_label_pairs) AS src_labels, values(Traffic.dest_label_pairs) AS dest_labels FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic WHERE Traffic.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Traffic.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Traffic.src_ip=$src_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.src_host=$src_host_ip|s$) (Traffic.dest_ip=$dest_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.dest_host=$dest_host_ip|s$) ($src_label_filter$ OR $dest_label_filter$) Traffic.transport=$protocol_tok|s$ Traffic.dest_port IN $port_filter$ Traffic.action IN $action_filter$ BY _time Traffic.timestamp Traffic.pce_fqdn Traffic.src_ip Traffic.dest_ip Traffic.dest_port Traffic.action
| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic BY Traffic.pce_fqdn
| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic WHERE Traffic.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ BY Traffic.org_id

| tstats `summariesonly` values(Traffic.src_label_pairs) AS src_label_pairs FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic WHERE Traffic.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Traffic.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Traffic.src_ip=$src_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.src_host=$src_host_ip|s$) (Traffic.dest_ip=$dest_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.dest_host=$dest_host_ip|s$) | mvexpand src_label_pairs | where src_label_pairs != "" AND isnotnull(src_label_pairs) | fields src_label_pairs

| tstats `summariesonly` values(Traffic.dest_label_pairs) AS dest_label_pairs FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic WHERE Traffic.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Traffic.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Traffic.src_ip=$src_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.src_host=$src_host_ip|s$) (Traffic.dest_ip=$dest_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.dest_host=$dest_host_ip|s$) | mvexpand dest_label_pairs | where dest_label_pairs != "" AND isnotnull(dest_label_pairs) | fields dest_label_pairs

| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic WHERE Traffic.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Traffic.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Traffic.src_ip=$src_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.src_host=$src_host_ip|s$) (Traffic.dest_ip=$dest_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.dest_host=$dest_host_ip|s$) ($src_label_filter$ OR $dest_label_filter$) Traffic.transport=$protocol_tok|s$ Traffic.dest_port IN $port_filter$ BY Traffic.action

| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic WHERE Traffic.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Traffic.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Traffic.src_ip=$src_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.src_host=$src_host_ip|s$) (Traffic.dest_ip=$dest_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.dest_host=$dest_host_ip|s$) ($src_label_filter$ OR $dest_label_filter$) Traffic.transport=$protocol_tok|s$ Traffic.action IN $action_filter$ BY Traffic.dest_port | sort +Traffic.dest_port

| tstats `summariesonly` count FROM datamodel=Illumio.Traffic WHERE Traffic.pce_fqdn=$pce_tok|s$ Traffic.org_id=$org_id_tok|s$ (Traffic.src_ip=$src_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.src_host=$src_host_ip|s$) (Traffic.dest_ip=$dest_host_ip|s$ OR Traffic.dest_host=$dest_host_ip|s$) ($src_label_filter$ OR $dest_label_filter$) Traffic.dest_port IN $port_filter$ Traffic.action IN $action_filter$ BY Traffic.transport

html.div: Please specify either hostname(s) or scope labels. If both hostname and scope labels are specified, then the filter uses AND condition.

search.query: | stats sum(flows) AS Flows BY Traffic.action | rename Traffic.action AS "Policy Decision"

| rename Traffic.dest_port AS port | eval Port = if(port > 0, port . " ", "") . upper(transport) | stats sum(flows) AS Flows, values(port) AS port, values(transport) AS transport BY Port | sort -Flows

html.div: Please be aware that you will need to install the Sankey Diagram App in order to see the following panel.

search.query: | eval Source = if(isnotnull(src_host), src_host, 'Traffic.src_ip') | eval Destination = if(isnotnull(dest_host), dest_host, 'Traffic.dest_ip') | rename Traffic.dest_port as Port | stats sum(flows) AS Flows BY Source Destination Port | table Source Destination Flows Port | sort -Flows | head $nflows$

| eval Source = if(isnotnull(src_host), src_host, 'Traffic.src_ip') | eval Destination = if(isnotnull(dest_host), dest_host, 'Traffic.dest_ip') | table Traffic.timestamp, Traffic.pce_fqdn, Source, direction, Destination, Traffic.dest_port, transport, flows, Traffic.action, src_labels, dest_labels | rename Traffic.timestamp AS Timestamp, Traffic.pce_fqdn AS "PCE", direction AS Direction, Traffic.dest_port AS "Port", transport AS Protocol, flows AS Flows, Traffic.action AS "Policy Decision", src_labels AS "Source Labels", dest_labels AS "Destination Labels" | fillnull value="-" "Source Labels" "Destination Labels" | eval Timestamp = strptime(Timestamp, "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S%Z") | fieldformat Timestamp = strftime(Timestamp, "%+") | sort -Timestamp
